languages.text: Крошечные сервочерепа оказались незаменимыми в техноритуалах. Они легко проскользнули мимо вражеских патрулей и наложили когниоковы на оборонительную технику врага, сохранив почтенным техножрецам минуты, нужные для богослужений.

Because of their size, the servo-skulls proved instrumental in the tech-rituals. They easily slipped past the patrols and placed cogni-shackles on the enemy defences, buying precious minutes for the Tech-Priests to perform their rites.
languages.original_text: Крошечные сервочерепа оказались незаменимыми в техноритуалах. Они легко проскользнули мимо вражеских патрулей и наложили когниоковы на оборонительную технику врага, сохранив почтенным техножрецам минуты, нужные для богослужений.

Because of their size, the servo-skulls proved instrumental in the tech-rituals. They easily slipped past the patrols and placed cogni-shackles on the enemy defences, buying precious minutes for the Tech-Priests to perform their rites.

languages.text: 伺服头骨在执行技术仪式的过程中非常有效。由于外型很不起眼，它们轻而易举地绕过了敌人的巡逻队，向敌人的防御装置施加了认知枷锁，为技术神甫举行仪式争取到了宝贵的时间。
languages.original_text: Because of their size, the servo-skulls proved instrumental in the tech-rituals. They easily slipped past the patrols and placed cogni-shackles on the enemy defences, buying precious minutes for the Tech-Priests to perform their rites.

traits.locale_text: 伺服头骨在执行技术仪式的过程中非常有效。由于外型很不起眼，它们轻而易举地绕过了敌人的巡逻队，向敌人的防御装置施加了认知枷锁，为技术神甫举行仪式争取到了宝贵的时间。

languages.text: サーヴォスカルはその大きさのおかげで、技術儀式において重要な役割を果たした。彼らはパトロールを難なくすり抜け、敵の防御にコグニ・シャックルを装着し、技術司祭たちが儀式を行うための貴重な時間を稼いだ。
languages.original_text: Because of their size, the servo-skulls proved instrumental in the tech-rituals. They easily slipped past the patrols and placed cogni-shackles on the enemy defences, buying precious minutes for the Tech-Priests to perform their rites.

traits.locale_text: サーヴォスカルはその大きさのおかげで、技術儀式において重要な役割を果たした。彼らはパトロールを難なくすり抜け、敵の防御にコグニ・シャックルを装着し、技術司祭たちが儀式を行うための貴重な時間を稼いだ。

languages.text: Aufgrund ihrer Größe erwiesen sich die Servoschädel als unverzichtbar bei den Tech-Ritualen. Sie umgingen problemlos die Patrouillen, platzierten Kognifesseln an der feindlichen Verteidigung und verschafften den Techpriestern so wertvolle Minuten für ihre Rituale.
languages.original_text: Because of their size, the servo-skulls proved instrumental in the tech-rituals. They easily slipped past the patrols and placed cogni-shackles on the enemy defences, buying precious minutes for the Tech-Priests to perform their rites.

traits.locale_text: Aufgrund ihrer Größe erwiesen sich die Servoschädel als unverzichtbar bei den Tech-Ritualen. Sie umgingen problemlos die Patrouillen, platzierten Kognifesseln an der feindlichen Verteidigung und verschafften den Techpriestern so wertvolle Minuten für ihre Rituale.

languages.text: Boyutları sayesinde hizmeletler, tekno ayinlerinde vazgeçilmez hâle geldi. Devriyelerin arasından süzülüp düşman savunmalarına kavramgaları yerleştirdiler. Tekno Rahiplere ayinlerini icra etmesi için kıymetli dakikalar kazandırdılar.
languages.original_text: Because of their size, the servo-skulls proved instrumental in the tech-rituals. They easily slipped past the patrols and placed cogni-shackles on the enemy defences, buying precious minutes for the Tech-Priests to perform their rites.

traits.locale_text: Boyutları sayesinde hizmeletler, tekno ayinlerinde vazgeçilmez hâle geldi. Devriyelerin arasından süzülüp düşman savunmalarına kavramgaları yerleştirdiler. Tekno Rahiplere ayinlerini icra etmesi için kıymetli dakikalar kazandırdılar.

languages.text: Su tamaño permitió a los servocráneos ser cruciales en los tecnorrituales. Eludieron sin problema las patrullas y colocaron cadenas cognitivas en las defensas enemigas, obteniendo unos minutos vitales para que los tecnosacerdotes completaran sus ritos.
languages.original_text: Because of their size, the servo-skulls proved instrumental in the tech-rituals. They easily slipped past the patrols and placed cogni-shackles on the enemy defences, buying precious minutes for the Tech-Priests to perform their rites.

traits.locale_text: Su tamaño permitió a los servocráneos ser cruciales en los tecnorrituales. Eludieron sin problema las patrullas y colocaron cadenas cognitivas en las defensas enemigas, obteniendo unos minutos vitales para que los tecnosacerdotes completaran sus ritos.

languages.text: Grâce à leur petite taille, les servocrânes ont joué un rôle crucial dans les technorituels. Ils n'ont eu aucun mal à atteindre les défenses ennemies sans se faire repérer par les patrouilles et ont placé des cogni-chaînes dessus afin de donner aux technoprêtres le temps nécessaire pour réaliser leurs rites.
languages.original_text: Because of their size, the servo-skulls proved instrumental in the tech-rituals. They easily slipped past the patrols and placed cogni-shackles on the enemy defences, buying precious minutes for the Tech-Priests to perform their rites.

traits.locale_text: Grâce à leur petite taille, les servocrânes ont joué un rôle crucial dans les technorituels. Ils n'ont eu aucun mal à atteindre les défenses ennemies sans se faire repérer par les patrouilles et ont placé des cogni-chaînes dessus afin de donner aux technoprêtres le temps nécessaire pour réaliser leurs rites.
